text: Sean Curran (born August 23, 1977 in Springfield, Massachusetts) is an American politician who represented the 9th Hampden District in the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 2005 to 2015.Massachusetts Legislature profile After six terms he declined to seek re-election; his term will end January 7, 2015.http://www.masslive.com/politics/index.ssf/2014/11/jose_tosado_robert_underwood_2014_massachusetts_house_9th_hampden_district.html ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Politicians from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Saint Anselm College alumni Category:Suffolk University Law School alumni Category:Massachusetts Democrats Category:Living people Category:Members of the Massachusetts House of Representatives
title: Sean Curran (politician)
